name: OrderApi_UpdateState
description:
### REMARKS ###
Use this call to change the state of an order to i.e. paid or sent.

The state is transfered to the external shop/marketplace if configured.
This is the list of known states:
- 1: ordered
- 2: confirmed
- 3: paid
- 4: shipped
- 5: reclamation
- 6: deleted
- 7: closed
- 8: canceled
- 9: archived
- 10: not used
- 11: demand note 1
- 12: demand note 2
- 13: packed
- 14: offered
- 15: payment reminder
- 16: fulfilling

id.description: The internal id of the order

body.description: The data used to change the state
